casebody.data:
EVANS
v.
AKRON GEN. MED. CTR. 2019-0284 Supreme Court of Ohio. June 20, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENT

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULING

On motion for admission pro hac vice of Stuart Mermelstein. Motion granted. Pursuant to Gov.Bar R. XII(4), counsel shall file a notice of permission to appear pro hac vice with the Supreme Court's Office of Attorney Services within 30 days.
